gold.user: As a developer, I want to retrieve the list of dynamic modules registered in the Jira Cloud platform so that I can verify their status and configuration.
gold.ideal: The response should include a JSON array of dynamic modules with their respective details such as module key, name, and status.

gold.user: As an administrator, I want to register new dynamic modules in the Jira Cloud platform so that they can be utilized by users in the application.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the successful registration of the dynamic modules with their keys and any relevant metadata.

gold.user: As a system administrator, I want to remove specific dynamic modules from the Jira Cloud platform to clean up unused or outdated modules.
gold.ideal: The response should indicate that the specified dynamic modules have been successfully removed and provide a confirmation message.
